resources.string: Just as Dom and Letty celebrate their honeymoon, Brian and Mia have withdrawn from the game and the rest of the team has disintegrated in search of a common and ordinary life; A mysterious woman will try to seduce Dom to convince him to return to the criminal life that both stalks him, betraying those around him and facing challenges never seen before. From the Cuban coast passing through the streets of New York and even the icy Arctic, the team will have to cross the world to stop an anarchist and avoid a global disaster bringing back home the man who turned them into a family.

Meet the most unusual baby, wear a suit. A boss in diapers is a universal and hilarious story about how the arrival of a new baby impacts a family, told from the perspective of a unreliable, but charming narrator: Tim, a seven-year-old, unbridled, imaginative mind. With a rogue, but poignant, message about the importance of the family.

Patriots Day is the reconstruction of the Boston bombing of 2013 and a tribute to the everyday heroes who inspired the world in the extraordinary hours that followed. Following an act of terrorist, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins brave survivors, lifeguards and investigators in a race against watch to catch the Bombers before they attack again. Along with the stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon); Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman); Sgt. Jeffrey Pugliese (JK Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan), this visceral and unshakable chronicle captures the intensity and suspense of an event that caught the world.

When three college students move to an old house off campus, unwittingly, they release a "Bye Bye Man \", a supernatural entity that pursues the one who discovers his name. They will try to keep their existence secret from the rest of a certain death.

Smurfette and her siblings practice hiking through the enchanted wilderness trying to find a legendary village for the Smurfs. You must do it before your nemesis, the evil wizard Gargamel, will do it. Along the way, some of the Smurfs +"'"+ mysteries begin to come to light.

Set in the new sound context of "Awesome mixtape # 2", Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2, Marvel, continues the adventures of the team in their journey through the confines of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their new family together while trying to unravel the mystery of Peter Quill+"'"+ s true lineage. Old rivals will become new allies and the favorite characters of the classic comics come to help our heroes as the cinematic universe of Marvel continues to expand.

Peter Parker / Spider-Man, who made his sensational debut in Captain America: Civil War, begins directing his new identity as a superhero in Spider-Man: Returning Home Excited by his experience with The Avengers, Peter returns to Home, where she lives with her Aunt May, under the watchful eye of her new mentor Tony Stark. Peter tries to fall back into his normal daily routine - distracted by the thoughts of proving himself to be more than just the friendly neighbor Spider-Man - but when the vulture emerges as a new villain, everything that is most important to Peter will be threatened.

In THOR - RAGNAROK, from Marvel Studios, Asgard is threatened, but Thor is trapped at the other end of the universe without his hammer and to escape and save his planet must face his former ally and fellow Avenger ... The incredible Hulk!

The humans and Transformers are at war, Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving our future lies in the secrets of the past, in the hidden history of the Transformers on Earth. To save our world falls on an improbable alliance: Cade Yeager (Mark Wahlberg); Bumblebee and an Oxford professor (Laura Haddock). There comes a time in everyone´s life when we are called to make a difference in the world. In Transformers: The Last Knight, the bad guys will become heroes. The heroes will become villains. Only one world will survive: yours or ours.

During the Cold War an organization called "Patriota" was created, a group of superheroes that included members of several Soviet republics. For years, heroes had to hide their identities, but in difficult times they must show themselves again.

As more and more children disappear in the city of Derry, Maine, a group of young people are forced to face one of their greatest fears when being cornered by a diabolical clown named Pennywise, a character with a history of murders and violence dating back to several Centuries ago.
Your Rating have been Made and Your Comments were Sended

Gru have been fired. He has run out of work because he has let supervillain Balthazar Bratt escape. Bratt was a child star of the 80s protagonist of a series where he interpreted a mind criminal mind that used a combination between techniques of hip-hop dance, martial arts and weapons of high technology. But with the onset of puberty he lost everything and has been creating chaos around the planet. Of course now, Gru is facing other problems. And is that he will meet his twin brother Dru, a billionaire just like him, but with long blond hair that you wear in white. Dru is eccentric and outgoing and Gru, although with a sense of humor, is still a crank. In addition, now Gru will have to decide if he is ready to continue the family tradition of engaging in crime, and join his brother to carry out a final blow. Although he has left that life behind ... will Gru become a villain again?

In this installment, Pelotillehue´s most beloved bird will undertake, along with his tenacious nephew Coné, a dangerous adventure to rescue his late mother-in-law Doña Tremebunda, abducted mysteriously by an alien band. What he has not taken into account is that, while trying to save Yayita´s mother, she will be romantically tempted by the insistent Pepe Cortisona.
This movie is added to your memories
